name.text: 27.1.5.2 Special Cases of Double Integrals Task

questiontext.text:
Evaluate the following integral:

\(I=\displaystyle\int_{@aa@}^{@bb@} \displaystyle \int_{@cc@}^{@dd@}z\left( w+1\right)\, \mathrm{d}w \mathrm{d}z \).

\(I=\) [[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]]

If your answer is not an integer, leave it in rational form e.g. 23/5.

generalfeedback.text:
The integration takes place over the rectangle shown below.

[[jsxgraph]] var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { boundingbox: [{#wmin#}, {#zmax#}, {#wmax#}, {#zmin#}], keepaspectratio: true, axis: true, showCopyright: false, showNavigation: false, grid: false }); // Hide tick labels and ticks on x-axis but label it board.defaultAxes.x.setAttribute({ ticks: { drawLabels: false, // hide numbers majorHeight: 0, minorHeight: 0 }, name: 'w', withLabel: true, label: { position: 'rt', offset: [1, -10] } }); // Hide tick labels and ticks on y-axis but label it board.defaultAxes.y.setAttribute({ ticks: { drawLabels: false, majorHeight: 0, minorHeight: 0 }, name: 'z', withLabel: true, label: { position: 'rt', offset: [-15, 0] } }); // points var bl = board.create('point', [{#cc#},{#aa#}], {fixed: true, withLabel:false, visible: true, showInfobox: false, size: 3, face: 'o', fillColor: 'black', strokeColor: 'black'}); var br = board.create('point', [{#dd#},{#aa#}], {fixed: true, withLabel:false, visible: true, showInfobox: false, size: 3, face: 'o', fillColor: 'black', strokeColor: 'black'}) var tr = board.create('point', [{#dd#},{#bb#}], {fixed: true, withLabel:false, visible: true, showInfobox: false, size: 3, face: 'o', fillColor: 'black', strokeColor: 'black'}); var tl = board.create('point', [{#cc#},{#bb#}], {fixed: true, withLabel:false, visible: true, showInfobox: false, size: 3, face: 'o', fillColor: 'black', strokeColor: 'black'}); var rectangle = board.create('polygon', [bl, br, tr, tl],{name:"Rectangle",withLabel:false, color: 'white'}); // Set all edges (borders) to dark blue rectangle.borders.forEach(line => { line.setAttribute({strokeColor: 'darkblue'}); }); // Label coordinates dynamically [bl, br, tr, tl].forEach((pt) => { board.create('text', [ () => pt.X() + 0.1, () => pt.Y() + 0.1, () => `(${pt.X()}, ${pt.Y()})` ], { fontSize: 12, fixed: true, highlight: false }); }); [[/jsxgraph]]

We have

\(\qquad \displaystyle I=\displaystyle\int_{@aa@}^{@bb@} \displaystyle \int_{@cc@}^{@dd@}z\left( w+1\right)\, \mathrm{d}w \mathrm{d}z, \)

Which we know can be rewritten as

\(\qquad \displaystyle I=\displaystyle\int_{@aa@}^{@bb@} z\, \mathrm{d}z \times \displaystyle \int_{@cc@}^{@dd@} \left( w+1\right)\, \mathrm{d}w \)

Evaluating this, we get

\(\qquad \displaystyle I=\displaystyle \left[\dfrac{z^2}{2}\right]_{@aa@}^{@bb@} \times \left[\dfrac{w^2}{2} + w\right]_{@cc@}^{@dd@} \)

\(\qquad \displaystyle = \displaystyle \left({@bb^2/2 - aa^2/2@}\right) \times \left({@dd^2/2+ dd@} - ({@cc^2/2 + cc@})\right)\)

\(\qquad \displaystyle = {@ta1@} \)

prtcorrect.text: Correct answer, well done.

prtpartiallycorrect.text: Your answer is partially correct.

prtincorrect.text: Incorrect answer.

qtest.description: Test case assuming the teacher's input gets full marks.
